nodes.text: Breakthrough was the title of a painting depicting Imperial forces breaking through Rebel fortifications. It showed an AT-ST and stormtroopers firing their weapons at unseen Rebel forces.

Breakthrough is a painting in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. It was available as a loot card in the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game's seventh expansion The Price of Victory and could be redeemed for an copy of the object in the MMORPG.

Players can use them to decorate their virtual homes. As an additional feature, owners of these paintings can use them to receive the player titles "Underlord", "XTS Executive" and "Black Sun Koppo Vigo" which can be displayed beneath the player's name.
